column4: Yo, listen up, my dude, and take in what I'm saying; and you'll live a long, fulfilling life.
I've totally schooled you in the ways of wisdom, and guided you on the correct lanes, fam.
When you move, you won't be held back, and when you sprint, you won't trip.
Embrace knowledge wholeheartedly; don't let it slip away. Cherish it, for it provides the essence of your existence.
Don't even step foot on the wicked's turf, and don't dare hang with those evil dudes.
Yo, I'm telling you, stay clear, don't even go near it, just bounce and move on.
These people don't sleep unless they're causing trouble. They can't rest unless they make someone else stumble.
Because they be chowing down on wickedness like it's bread, and sippin' on violence like it's fine wine.
The way of righteous people is like a lit TikTok trend, only getting brighter and cooler until it reaches its peak awesomeness.
The path of the wicked is like a total blackout: they have no idea what they're tripping over.
Listen up, my dude. Pay close attention to my words and really tune in to what I'm saying.
Don't let them slip your gaze; hold them close to your heart.
When you come across them, they're like the ultimate life hack, giving you good vibes and boosting your overall well-being. It's like the best medicine for your mind, body, and soul.
Protect your heart with utmost care, because it determines the course of your life. It's like the ultimate priority, you know?
Get rid of that toxic speech and keep your lips away from being deceitful.
Keep your eyes focused ahead, and let your eyelids stay fixed on what's in front of you.
Think about the path you're on and make sure all your actions are solid. {or else all your actions will be aligned properly}
Stay on track and don't get distracted, steer clear of wickedness.
Listen up, my dude, pay attention to my insight and be open-minded to my knowledge:
So you can be wise and your words can be filled with knowledge.
When it comes to seductive talk, that girl's got mad skills. Her words are sweeter than a honeycomb and smoother than oil. üî•
But the outcome really sucks, like when your fav snack turns out to be super bitter, and it stings so bad, like a sword with two sharp edges.
She's headed straight for destruction; every move she makes brings her closer to disaster.
So you don't have to overthink life's journey, it's constantly changing, and you can't predict it.
Listen up, fam! Pay attention to what I'm about to say and don't ignore it, okay?
Stay away from her, don't even go near her house:
Don't go handing out your street cred to just anyone, or letting the haters snatch away your precious time:
Don't let random people steal your riches and benefit from your hard work; they shouldn't reap the rewards of your hustle in someone else's crib.
And you gonna be bummed out in the end, when your body and your health are totally wrecked,
And like, seriously, why did I have to be so against learning and totally dismiss any form of constructive criticism?
And like, totally didn't listen to my teachers or pay attention to those who were trying to educate me!
I was like, this close to getting caught up in all the bad stuff that goes down when people get together.
Stay hydrated with your own stash of water, and quench your thirst with the flowing goodness from your very own well.
Share your blessings everywhere, like streams of water flowing through the streets.
Keep them as your own, not shared with strangers.
May your vibe always be blessed, and may you have a lit time with your OG spouse.

May she be like a beautiful and graceful deer; may her curves captivate you at all times; and may you always be enraptured by her love. (quench your thirst)} {always be mesmerized...: May you always wander passionately in her love}
Bruh, why you tryna get all caught up with some random girl? Like, why you wanna cuddle up with a total stranger?
God sees everything we do and pays close attention to every move we make.
The wicked will be trapped by their own wrongdoings and held captive by the consequences of their sins.
If he doesn't wise up, he's basically doomed; his foolishness will lead him down the wrong path.
Yo dude, if you vouch for your bro, and you've made a bond with someone you don't know,
You're totally trapped by what you say, like seriously caught up in the things that come outta your mouth.

Yo, listen up, my dude! When you find yourself in a sticky situation with your homie, it's time to work some magic. Show some humility, reach out, and make things right with your friend. Trust me, it's the key to winning them over.
Don't let your eyes snooze or your eyelids take a nap.
Save yourself like a swift deer escaping from the grip of the skilled hunter, or like a free-spirited bird steering clear from the clutches of the crafty trapper.
Yo, lazy peeps, check out the ant and learn somethin' from it. Get your act together and gain some wisdom:
They have no one to tell them what to do, watch over them, or be in charge,
She gets her food ready in the summer, and collects her snacks during harvest time.
Bruh, when are you gonna wake up already? Stop being such a lazy potato and get out of bed!
Just a quick nap, a bit of chillin', a little time for some Zzzs:
Your poverty will come upon you like a nomadic traveler, and your lack will hit you like a strong warrior.
A jerk, a wicked dude, rolls with a mouth that's always causing drama.
He's lowkey slick with it, throwing winks with his eyes, dropping knowledge with his feet, and teaching like a boss with his fingers.
He's got a twisted mind, always scheming to cause trouble and spread division.
That's when things are gonna go downhill real quick for him. He'll be completely messed up, no coming back from it, just like that.

God really doesn't like these six things, like seriously, he finds them absolutely disgusting. And you won't believe it, but there are even seven things that he considers a total nightmare. Like, they're straight-up an abomination to him, you know? They make his soul cringe, for real.
When you act all high and mighty, spew lies, and harm innocent people, it's not cool. #NoJudgment
A mind that comes up with messed up ideas, legs that hurry to engage in trouble,
Someone who lies and spreads drama among friends is not cool.
Yo, listen up, bro. Make sure you follow your dad's rules and don't forget to respect your mom's teachings.
Keep them close to your heart, and wear them like a necklace.
When you go, it'll show you the way; when you sleep, it'll protect you; and when you wake up, it'll have a chat with you.

Like, the commandment is legit a lamp, you know? And the law is like so lit, it's all about light. And like, when you get those reproofs of instruction, they're like the ultimate key to living your best life, no cap. Oh, and just fyi, they call it a lamp or a candle, ya feel me?
To protect you from the bad vibes of toxic people, from the smooth talk of unfamiliar ladies. {of the...: or, of the unfamiliar slang}
Don't get all thirsty for her looks in your heart, like don't let her flutter those eyelashes and deceive you either.
Through a thot, a man can be reduced to a mere snack, and the seductress will go after the most valuable soul. (The seductress: in other words, a married woman)
Imagine if a dude decides to hold fire close to his chest, thinking his outfit won't get scorched, like, seriously?
Bruh, try walking on hot coals and not get burned. Impossible, right?
If someone hooks up with their neighbor's partner, anyone who gets involved won't be guilt-free.
Like, people don't like hate on a thief, ya know, if he's just stealing 'cause he's starving and needs to feed himself, man!
But, like, if he gets caught, he's gotta totally make up for it! He's gotta give back seven times what he took and, like, pay for all the stuff he took from his home.
Someone who cheats on their partner with another person doesn't know what they're doing, they're basically ruining their own soul.
He gonna suffer big time and be totally humiliated; he won't be able to shake off the shame.
Jealousy makes someone go absolutely nuts, so they won't hold back when it's time for payback.
He won't be swayed by any bribe, and he won't be satisfied even if you shower him with tons of gifts.
Yo, listen up, son! Take my words to heart and store my commandments in your brain.
Yo, follow my commandments and you'll live your best life; treat my law like it's your favorite app.
Keep them on your fingers and engrave them on the core of your being.
Tell wisdom, like, you're my sister; and call understanding, like, your fam:
So you don't get caught up with shady people, those who pretend to be all nice and compliment you all the time.
So, like, I was just chilling at the window of my crib, peeping through my casement, ya know?
So, I was looking at this group of clueless and naive young people, and I noticed there was this one guy who had absolutely no idea what he was doing.
Just casually strolling down the block, cruising past her usual hangout spot; and he ended up at her crib.
At dusk, when the sun sets and darkness covers the land: {in the evening: Heb. in the evening of days}
Yo, check it out, this woman comes up to him all dressed like she's tryna show off, with a cunning mind.
She be extra loud and stubborn; she never chill at home:
She's out there one minute, wandering the streets, and lurking at every corner.)
She grabbed him and kissed him, and then confidently looked at him and said,
I've got some sick offerings here; just fulfilled my promises today. They're legit fire, no cap. üî•
So, I came here to meet you, really hoping to find you, and guess what? I totally did!
I've totally hyped up my bed, it's got the coolest tapestry covers, with some sick designs and high-quality Egyptian linen.
I made my bed all cozy with some sweet-smelling myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
Yo, let's indulge in some serious love stuff all night long. Let's comfort ourselves with affection.
The dude ain't home, he took off on a far-out adventure:
He's got a whole load of cash on him, and he'll come back right on schedule. #NoPromises
She used her smooth talking to make him give in, and her flattery compelled him with her enticing words.
He immediately goes after her, like an idiot heading towards a trap or a clueless person walking into trouble.

Like, imagine getting hit hard with a sudden problem, just like an unexpected arrow to the gut. It's like when a bird zooms into a trap without even realizing that it's putting its own life at risk, you know?
Listen up, fam! It's time to pay attention to what I'm about to say, all you young ones out there.
Don't let your heart stray towards her ways, don't wander off on her paths.
Because she has defeated countless people: yeah, she has taken down many powerful dudes.
Yo, her crib be leading straight to hell, like a dope ride to the chambers of death.
Yo, isn't wisdom out here yelling? And understanding, she's raising her voice too!
She's flexin' at the highest spots, chillin' on the sickest roads.
She's screaming at the gates, at the entrance of the city, as people walk in through the doors.
Yo, guys! Listen up! I'm reaching out to all you dudes, the sons of humanity.
Yo fam, listen up: if you're clueless, try to grasp some wisdom. And all you fools out there, seriously, get yourselves a brain and start understanding things.
Listen up, 'cause I'm 'bout to drop some wisdom bombs with my real talk and spill truth from my mouth.
I always keep it real and stay away from anything shady or dishonest. I can't stand talking about anything that's morally wrong, it's just not my vibe.
Everything I say is righteous; there's nothing twisted or perverted about it. #straightup
They're all pretty clear to those who get it, and total facts to those who gain knowledge.
Yo, listen up and soak in my guidance, don't be chasing after that paper, but seek wisdom over flexing with that expensive bling.
Wisdom is, like, way more awesome than rubies, and nothing else even comes close to how cool it is!
I'm all about that wisdom and strategic thinking, and I'm constantly uncovering cool new knowledge and clever ideas. {subtilty: or, being clever}
Respecting the LORD means hating evil: I can't stand pride, arrogance, the wrong path, and a mouth that's always causing trouble.
I've got all the wisdom and smarts, with an added power boost.
I'm the boss when it comes to kings ruling and princes making fair decisions.
Princes and nobles got their swag from me, even the judges of the whole earth.
I'm all about those who show love towards me, and those who come looking for me early in the game will totally find me.
I've got the ultimate flex in my pocket - not just stacks of cash and clout, but also long-lasting wealth and straight-up righteousness.
My fruit is straight-up better than gold, even fancy gold. And my cash flow beats out top-tier silver.
I'm totally rollin' on the righteous path, keepin' it real in the midst of all the judgment vibes.
So that those who are loyal to me can flex their wealth, and I'll help them stack up their riches.
God had me from the start, way before all the cool things He did.
I've been around since forever, way before the Earth even existed.
Like, when things were totally chill and there were no deep places or like, fancy water fountains, I was just, you know, brought into existence and stuff.
Even before the mountains were flexin', before them hills showed up, I was already poppin' off:
Before he created the earth, the fields, or even the most important part of the world's dust,
When God made the heavens, I was right there with Him, witnessing it all go down. He even marked out the boundaries of the ocean depths with precision.
When he set up the sick clouds in the sky and made the deep waters flow with power:
When he flexed on the sea and was like, 'Yo, you better not cross this line!' and set up the whole earth like a boss.
I used to hang out with him all the time, like we were BFFs. He totally loved having me around, and I was always stoked, spreading positive vibes no matter what!
I was stoked to hang out on Earth, where it's all happening, and I had a blast chilling with humans.
Listen up, fam: those who stay on my grind will be straight up blessed.
Listen up, seek wisdom, no FOMO on learning.
Happy is the person who listens to me, staying tuned in to what I have to say every single day, patiently waiting for opportunities to come knocking.
If you discover me, you'll discover the ultimate vibes and gain the Lord's favor. {bring forth: Hebrew slang for come through}
But yo, anyone who disses me is straight up disrespecting their own soul: all those haters be showing love for death.
Yo, wisdom really be flexin' with her dope crib, she went all out with her seven fire pillars:
She's slaughtered her animals, mixed her drinks, and set up her table.
She's got her squad out, shouting from the prime spots in the city.
Yo, if you're clueless, come chill here. And if you lack common sense, she straight up calls you out, bro.
Hey, come through and grub on my bread, and sip on the lit wine I've mixed up for ya.
Ditch the clueless folks and embrace life; follow the path of knowledge.
If you call out someone who constantly mocks others, you're gonna get some major embarrassment back at ya. And if you try to correct a truly evil person, it's gonna leave a mark on your reputation.
Don't waste your energy on haters, they'll just end up hating you even more. But if you give some constructive criticism to a wise person, they'll appreciate and respect you.
Share some knowledge with a smart person, and they'll get even smarter: educate a righteous individual, and they'll keep on growing in wisdom.
Respecting God is like step one in being wise, and really understanding what's sacred is like the key to unlocking knowledge.
Yo, listen up! When you chill with me, your days gonna multiply and your life gonna level up with more years. No cap!
If you stay woke, it's for your own benefit. But if you clown on everything, you'll have to deal with the consequences all by yourself.
A clueless woman is always making noise, she's naive and knows nothing.
Cause she's posted up at the front door of her crib, chilling on a throne in the prime spots of the city,
To invite those who are walking in the right direction to join us:
If you're feeling clueless, come over here: and if you lack understanding, listen up!
Sneaking a sip from someone else's drink hits different, and munching on a hidden snack is low-key satisfying. *whispers* It's like an exclusive club for your taste buds. *wink*
But he doesn't even realize that the dead people are chilling there, and her guests are straight up in the depths of hell.
These are the wise words of Solomon. A son who acts wisely brings joy to his dad, but a son who acts foolishly brings sorrow to his mom.
Having a bunch of sketchy stuff won't make you rich, but being on the right path saves you from total disaster.
Bruh, God won't let the souls of the righteous starve, but He straight up ditches the stuff the wicked ones got. Like, their whole deal evaporates because of how wicked they are.
If you're lazy with your hustle, you're gonna end up broke. But if you stay on your grind, that's how you make bank.
Someone who gets their work done during summer is smart, but someone who sleeps during harvest brings shame upon themselves.
Good vibes go to the cool ones, but bad vibes shut up the haters.
The good vibes from righteous people are like, totally lit. But the reputation of the wicked? It's gonna decay like, super gross.
Those who are open-minded and attentive will embrace guidance, while those who blabber nonsense will face defeat.
If you stay true to yourself, you'll have confidence in your steps. But if you go astray, people will see right through you.
If someone constantly throws shade or talks nonsense, they're just asking for trouble. They'll end up getting roasted.
The words of a good person bring life and positivity, but negativity and harm are the only things that come out of a bad person's mouth.
Hating on others just leads to conflicts, but love is all about forgiving each other's mistakes.
Someone smart speaks wise words, but someone clueless gets what's coming to them.
Smart peeps be stockpilin' knowledge: but fools, their yappin' leads 'em straight to ruin.
The rich dude's mad cash is like his epic fortress: the total bummer for the poor peeps is their crushing poverty.
When good people hustle, they thrive in life, while bad people's actions lead them towards sin.
The path to a good life is paved with being open to learning and correction, but those who reject feedback will veer off course. {erreth: or, cause themselves and others to go astray}
Anyone who fakes kindness but actually hates, and anyone who spreads rumors, is just plain foolish.
When you talk non-stop, you're bound to mess up: but someone who knows when to shut up is actually pretty smart.
The words of righteous people are like top-quality silver: but the thoughts of wicked people are basically worthless.
The words of good people can inspire and encourage many, but fools suffer because they lack the wisdom to make good decisions. {of wisdom: referring to having a wise heart}
God's blessings make you thrive, without any unnecessary stress.
Doing bad things may seem fun to a clueless person, but a person who's got a clue knows that wisdom is where it's at.
When wicked people start freaking out, their worst fears will actually happen to them. But good and righteous people will get what they wish for.
When the whirlwind blows by, the wicked are gone for good, but the righteous stand firm forever.

Like, you know when you drink something super acidic and it makes your teeth feel weird? Or when there's this annoying smoke that gets into your eyes and messes up your vision? Well, that's exactly how it feels when you have a lazy person on a mission for you.
Respecting God adds more time to your life, but if you're wicked, your years will be cut short. {addeth: Hebrew for extends}
The righteous can be stoked by hope, but the wicked's high hopes will totally fade away.
The path of the LORD is like a power-up for those who do the right thing, but it's game over for those who choose to do wrong.
The good ones will always stay strong, while the bad ones won't last on this Earth.
The mouth of a good person speaks wise things, but someone with a mean tongue will face consequences.
The righteous speak in a way others respect, but the wicked use their words to be difficult and troublesome.
Using fake scales is a total no-no to the LORD, but fair and accurate measurements make him super happy. (FYI, fake scales are super shady, just saying.)
When someone becomes too full of themselves, they're bound to end up feeling embarrassed. On the flip side, those who stay humble are the ones who truly possess wisdom.
Being true to yourself will always keep you on the right path, but those who constantly go against the rules will only lead themselves to ruin.
Being rich doesn't really matter when the big bad judgment day comes knocking, but being righteous can save your sorry self from death's grip.
When someone's got their act together, they'll know which way to go. But those who are messed up will end up falling because of their own messed-up choices. {rectify: Hebrew meaning to make right}
If you stay righteous, you'll be saved from trouble, but if you mess up, you'll get caught in your own mischief.
When a wicked person dies, their hopes and dreams go up in smoke. The unjust lose all their chances of success.
The good ones always escape trouble, while the bad ones take their place.
A fake person who talks trash about others ruins their reputation, but the righteous are protected through understanding.
When things are going great for the good guys, the whole town is lit, and when the bad dudes bite the dust, there's a major celebration happening.
When upright peeps bring their blessings, the city levels up and thrives. But when the wicked start spewing nonsense, it's game over, bye-bye city.
Someone who lacks wisdom disses their neighbor, but a person who's got brains knows when to zip it. {destitute...: Hebrew for lacking a thoughtful heart}
Someone who spreads gossip spills the tea, but someone who is trustworthy keeps things on the down low. {A talebearer: In other words, someone who loves to spill the tea.}
When there's no squad to turn to, people end up tripping, but when you've got a crew of wise advisors, that's where true security lies.
If someone vouches for a random person, they're gonna regret it big time, but if you avoid vouching for others, you'll be just fine.
A dope queen keeps her legacy intact: and powerful peeps secure the bag.
The dude who shows mercy is all about doing good for himself, but the one who's all cruel brings trouble on their own bod.
The wicked be pullin' sneaky moves, but the righteous be reapin' sweet rewards.
Being righteous leads to a well-lived life, but if you choose to chase after evil, it'll only bring you closer to your own downfall.
The Lord is not a fan of those with a bad attitude, but totally vibes with those who stay true and righteous.
Even if the bad guys team up, they won't get away with it! But the offspring of the righteous will be saved.
Like a gold earring on a pig's nose, so is a pretty girl who lacks common sense.
The righteous only want what's good, while the wicked will face consequences.
Some people give it away and end up getting more, while others hoard and end up with nothing.
A generous heart will be rewarded with abundance, and those who refresh others will find themselves refreshed as well. {liberal...: Heb. soul of blessing}
If someone hoards food, the people will totally curse them, but anyone who sells it will be blessed for real.
If you're all about finding the good, you'll totally score some major brownie points. But if you're all about causing trouble, it's definitely gonna come back to bite you.
If you be all about that money, you gonna trip and fall. But if you stay true and righteous, you gonna thrive like a fresh branch.
If someone causes drama within their own household, they'll end up with nothing but empty promises. And those who act foolish will end up groveling before those who are smart and wise.
The vibes of righteous peeps are like a lit tree of life, and anyone who helps others find truth is straight-up smart.
Look, the good people will get what they deserve in this world: and it goes double for the bad and sinful ones.
If you're into learning new things, you're all about that knowledge. But if you can't handle criticism, let's just say you're not the brightest bulb in the box.
A righteous dude gets major love from the LORD, but a shady dude with twisted plans gets majorly crushed.
A person can't build a solid foundation by being wicked, but those who do what's right will stand strong and unshakable.
A dope woman is like a flex on her hubby, but if she embarrasses him, it's like straight up bad vibes in his soul.
The vibes of those who do good are on point: while the plans of the haters are full of lies.
The words of the haters always plotting something bad, but the real ones use their voice to protect others.
The wicked get wrecked and disappear, while the squad of the righteous stays strong.
A person gets respect for being wise, but if someone has a twisted mindset, they'll be looked down upon. {twisted mindset: means they're all messed up on the inside}
Someone who's looked down upon, but still has a squad, is way cooler than someone who's all about self-promotion but can't even afford basic necessities.
A good person cares about their pets, but the bad people show no mercy and can be really heartless.
The person who works their land will be content with food, but the one who chases after empty trends lacks wisdom.
The bad guys wanna flex their shady moves, but the foundation of the good guys brings nothing but good vibes. It's all about that positive energy, you know?
When someone does something wrong and speaks out, it's like they're setting a trap for themselves. But those who do what's right will find a way out of trouble. #StayHumbleStaySafe
When you speak good things, you'll be happy with the results, and when you work hard, you'll be rewarded for your efforts.
A fool thinks they're always right, but the wise ones listen to advice.
When a fool gets angry, everyone knows immediately, but a wise person knows how to stay cool and avoid embarrassment.
If you keep it real, you're all about being honest and righteous. But if you're fake, you're just bringing deceit and lies.
Some people talk straight-up savage, like a sword slicing through, ya know? But the words of the smart ones, they bring good vibes and healing, ya feel me?
Being truthful will always prevail, but lying only lasts for a short while.
Those who plot evil carry deceit in their hearts, but those who seek peace find true joy.
The righteous won't have any bad stuff happen to them, but the wicked will totally get themselves into trouble.
God totally can't stand people who lie, like it's a total abomination. But those who always keep it real, they're like God's favorite.
A smart person keeps their knowledge to themselves, but fools love to broadcast their foolishness.
If you put in the work, you'll be the boss, but if you're lazy, you'll be paying up. {slothful: or, deceitful}
When you're feeling down and heavy-hearted, it can really bring you down. But when someone speaks kind words, it can totally lift your spirits and make you happy.
The righteous person is, like, way cooler than their neighbor, but the path of the wicked totally tricks them into doing bad stuff.
The lazy person doesn't even bother to cook the food they caught while hunting: but a hardworking person's accomplishments are highly valuable.
Living right leads to a dope life, and you won't find any bummer endings on that path.
A smart kid listens to their dad's advice, but a mocker ignores criticism.
When you speak positively, it brings good things in your life. But those who do wrong, they invite trouble for themselves.
If you keep your mouth shut, you'll keep out of trouble, but if you never stop blabbering, you're in for disaster.
The lazy AF person wants things, but ends up with nothing: but the hardworking person's soul will be lit AF.
A legit person despises lying, but a shady person is straight-up disgusting and ends up feeling humiliated.
Staying true to what's right helps the good ones stay on track, but living the wrong way brings down those who do bad things.
There are some people who front like they're rich, but actually have nothing, and then there are others who act all poor but secretly have mad riches.
Having mad stacks won't save your life, but if you're broke, you won't have to deal with haters.
The glow-up of the righteous is lit: but the vibes of the wicked will be extinguished. {vibes: or, mood}
You know how it goes, straight-up drama only comes from being too full of yourself, but if you're smart about it, that's where the real wisdom is at.
Trying to flex with money that you didn't really earn will eventually disappear, but those who hustle and work hard will see their wealth grow. (working hard with your own hands)
When you don't get what you hope for, it can really bum you out, but when your desires do come true, it's like a total life boost.
If you disrespect the word, you'll face destruction, but if you respect the commandment, you'll receive some sweet rewards. üíØ
The wisdom game's rules are like a life-giving juice cleanse, helping you ditch death traps.
Having good knowledge brings you positive outcomes: but choosing the path of disobedience can be tough.
A wise person always handles things wisely, but a fool exposes their own foolishness. #BeSmart
If you're a shady messenger, you're gonna get caught up in trouble. But if you're a loyal messenger, you bring the good vibes and positivity.
If you reject guidance, you're gonna deal with being broke and embarrassed, but if you embrace constructive feedback, you'll become someone everyone respects.
When you achieve what you really want, it feels amazing and satisfying. But for clueless people, it's like totally disgusting to stay away from doing bad stuff.
If you hang out with smart people, you'll become smart too. But if you chill with fools, you'll end up getting wrecked. üí•
Sinners out here getting chased by bad vibes, but the righteous are about to get blessed with some serious good karma.
A dope person leaves behind mad stacks for their future fam: and that money from shady peeps gets blessed upon the righteous ones.
The hustle of the poor can bring in a lot of dough, but making wrong moves can also lead to major losses.
If you refuse to set boundaries and discipline your child, it shows that you don't really care about their well-being. But if you truly love them, you'll correct and guide them at the right time.
The good vibes person devours food to feel totally satisfied: but the stomach of the bad vibes person will end up craving more.
A wise girl builds up her crib, but a dum-dum tears it down herself.
If you live righteously, you'll have mad respect for the LORD, but if you're all twisted in your ways, you straight up disrespect Him.
Fools struttin' 'round with big egos only bring trouble upon themselves, but the wise ones use their words to keep 'em outta trouble.
If you don't have any oxen, your crib stays clean. But having oxen brings in a whole lotta gains and power.
A legit witness ain't gonna lie: but a fake witness gonna be spreading lies.
Someone who thinks they know it all tries to find wisdom, but, like, they totally struggle with it. But, yo, knowledge comes easily to those who actually get it.
Dip outta there when you spot a clueless dude spewing zero wisdom vibes.
Smart peeps know the importance of self-awareness, while fools just play pretend.
Only fools think sin is a joke, but the righteous are all about the good vibes.
The heart knows its own struggles, and outsiders shouldn't mess with its happiness. {the bitterness of his soul: Hebrew refers to the bitterness within the person's soul}
The crib of the bad peeps gonna get wrecked, but the chill pad of the righteous gonna thrive.
Sometimes we think we know what's right, but it can lead us down a path of destruction.
Even when we're laughing, our hearts can still be filled with sorrow; and that laughter eventually turns into heaviness.

If you're all about going back on your beliefs, you'll end up dealing with the consequences of your own choices. But on the flip side, a genuinely awesome person will find fulfillment within themselves.
The naive person trusts everything they hear, but the wise one carefully considers their path.
